docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

welcome to my docs

docs.title: 1.安装mkdocs
docs.text:
pip install mkdocs

安装&配置主题 pip install mkdocs-material

theme:
    name: 'material'

docs.title: 2.创建项目
docs.text:
mkdocs new my-wiki
cd my-wiki

预览项目，首先进入my-wiki文件夹下，运行mkdocs serve命令

cd my-wiki
mkdocs serve

docs.title: 3.页面布局
docs.text:
导航栏支持多级布局，详见👉 mkdocs开发文档教程

nav: 
    - Home: index.md
    - User Guide:
        - num_1: 1.md
        - num_2: 2.md
    - About
        - xx: 3.md
        - xx: 4.md


nav:
    - Home: index.md
    - Dev_documents:
        - Dev_documents/about_git/git.md
        - Dev_documents/request_process/网络请求.md

docs.title: 4.部署wiki到github并发布
docs.text:
• 在github中创建自己的仓库
  • 在本地做完相对应的git操作后push到远程仓库 git push origin master
  • 进入my-wiki文件夹，进行部署
cd ./my-wiki/
mkdocs gh-deploy
